name: [Unfinished]Room 101
description:
Submission to Triple Trijam. Took around 15 hours to current stage.

Description:

Experience life in the glorious new republic. Where you will be happy. Where you will be safe. Where you will be free.  For we can only be truly content once the last vestiges of dissent have been eliminated.

Notes: 

Only some of the mechanics are currently present in the game. 

Bugs:

Pickup won't work after using unity timeline but otherwise fine in editor

Controls:

Move : WASD

Look around : Mouse

Clap: x

Pick up: q

Throw : e

Credits:

Programming : Oph

Art : Cicero

Music and SFX : RaphaelBatot     https://soundcloud.com/raphaelbatot
